solution_line_template: {total_employees} x {salary_increase_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{total_employees}*{salary_increase_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={employees_salary_increase}>>{employees_salary_increase} employees got a salary increase.

{total_employees} x {travel_allowance_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator} = <<{total_employees}*{travel_allowance_percentage_numerator}/{percentage_denominator}={employees_travel_allowance_increase}>>{employees_travel_allowance_increase} employees got a travel allowance increase.

So a total of {employees_salary_increase} + {employees_travel_allowance_increase} = <<{employees_salary_increase}+{employees_travel_allowance_increase}={total_employees_with_increase}>>{total_employees_with_increase} employees got an increase.

Therefore, {total_employees} - {total_employees_with_increase} = <<{total_employees}-{total_employees_with_increase}={employees_no_increase}>>{employees_no_increase} employees did not get any increase.
